website_summaries.verdict: Fruity flavor and versatile powdered formula goes a long way, but not for individuals with sensitive stomachs.
pros: Contains juices of 30 fruits and vegetables plus 5 grams of fiber, and makes up to 30 servings
Organic powdered formula can be mixed in any liquid
cons: The consistency is somewhat gritty, and some users developed digestive system upsets after taking it

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has a nice flavor, not too sweet tasting and not strong. It's a mild berry flavor. I mix it in with an Adkins Vanilla shake with some spinach, or fruit or whenever you want. It tastes better than just mixing it with water. Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Torres

customer_reviews.title: Getting all the Nutrients needed daily
customer_reviews.text: Heard about this product through an advertisement on the radio, Sunday mornings in L.A., CA. I've been looking for a "tasty" product to use in our smoothies daily that would give us fruit and vegetables without worrying about how many servings a day we could try and get in. I love the smell. It smells like a container of fruit!!! I also ordered the Chocolate flavor. Love both of them. My husband will never suspect he's getting all of these good fruits and vegetables in his "chocolate smoothie" each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Miller

customer_reviews.title: Terrible green powder.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible green powder. Too much chia, sugar, and maybe a dairy based whey protein or probiotic. Only green powder to cause extreme bloating, but no bowel movement, and facial outbreak/skin reaction. I discarded entire product after only using 4-5 days. Thumbs down!
customer_reviews.author: MONICA HUBBARD

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other OJC products
customer_reviews.text: I usually order the OJC blueberry and OJC apple pie greens and mix them together, but I decided to try this. Unfortunately the taste was not great, and shortly after drinking it my stomach was upset. Not as good as their other products, going back to my usual blend.
customer_reviews.author: ccc

customer_reviews.title: I love purity products
customer_reviews.text: I love purity products! They have good quality items. This stuff made me use the bathroom really well right after I drank it. I will buy again and again. It is a little expensive though for just a 30 scoop container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good if prepared right
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after reading the reviews of which some were negative. No doubt if prepared with only water is quite bitter. So I purchased one of those mini blender’s and bought some frozen fruit and orange juice and mixed it together with very good results. It tasted great and I have noticed a serious boost in energy over the past three days. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ironhardt

customer_reviews.title: ... - I have at least one a day - enjoy they are also great 'on the road' - at ...
customer_reviews.text: The Organic Juice Cleanse is simply THE EASIEST WAY TO JUICE - if you have a water bottle - just add a scoop of Organic Juice Cleanse and shake it up - and drink - it doesn't get much easier than that - and if you never tried them - ALL the flavors are delicious - I am partial to the Blueberry Dextox - and all my blood work (recently) was 'great' - which I attribute to Organic Juice Cleanse - I have at least one a day - enjoy they are also great 'on the road' - at least you know your having something good , even if you stop for food that's less than healthy
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Holding out hope for a fifth star
customer_reviews.text: Not knowing the taste of something before dropping an considerable amount of money on it is a big one for me. The idea of doing something good for myself superseded my ambivalence. I'm glad I went there! I give it 4 stars because frankly?, it's only been a minute since I've been drinking it. Maybe after a full month or two I'll feel the benefits and be able to give an honest review. Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: Tessie Burton

customer_reviews.title: Too Early To Tell
customer_reviews.text: I don't dislike the product, it's just too early to tell if it's doing anything for me since I am only halfway through the first container. Hence the reason for my three star rating. The flavor is fine, I use it in my morning fruit smoothie and it mixes well in my blender. I will amend the rating to five stars if I feel the product is doing what is promised.
customer_reviews.author: NG, Florida

customer_reviews.title: It made me cramping really really bad in my stomach and I actually threw up both
customer_reviews.text: I've use this product twice. And both times I got extremely sick and couldn't stay off the toilet. It made me cramping really really bad in my stomach and I actually threw up both times
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Harsh product...severely upset my stomach
customer_reviews.text: A bit too harsh for my digestive system. Unfortunately, I waited to use the product and missed the return window...a significant amount of money wasted...:(.
customer_reviews.author: SpringdaleCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get your veggies daily requirement. Easy do make & refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Florence Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, product as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the taste is far better than any other greens products I’ve tried before. It’s a little spendy in my opinion, and not 100% sure how effective it is. I am going to continue to stay on it and see how it goes. With this being said, I’ve not had any of the negative side effects others claim to have had. We all have different body chemistry and for me, I’ve had nothing bad happen while on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Heikkila

customer_reviews.title: Healthy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. I feel I'm doing something good for my body. I mix my morning drink with 12 oz of copper water. I would not like it thicker.
customer_reviews.author: noderat

customer_reviews.title: Way too sweet
customer_reviews.text: Tastes awful and extremely sweet. Wasn’t able to get through one shake.
customer_reviews.author: Ornella

customer_reviews.title: Not as much in container?
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for over a year. It's an easy way to get some fruits/vegetables in my day. Taste is pleasant, although a little gritty. I have noticed that I don't seem to make it 30 days before the container is empty. Not sure if the scoop volume is different, but I use level scoops and the container only lasts about 24 days...??
customer_reviews.author: D. Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful it's a tad bit greedy but tastes good and I can feel the benefits I am going through chemo treatments and this is helped me with my energy because I've had to work part-time to keep my insurance benefits active could not have done it without this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It gives me energy and the taste is great! I am definitely going to be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what all the hype was about make your own
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Screws

customer_reviews.title: great stuff! not sure if it's had an effect ...
customer_reviews.text: great stuff! not sure if it's had an effect yet, but it's a juice!
customer_reviews.author: janegrey

customer_reviews.title: Feels like food
customer_reviews.text: Sure it tastes good and is a fine dietary supplement, but the thing that stands out in my mind about Purity's Berry Surprise is the fact it "feels" like food in your stomach. This is a sign you are consuming something your body can put to use and leads to some measure of "post-meal" satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brindley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best natural product I have ever tried for an excellent digestion.....love it!
customer_reviews.author: ILC

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: On the expensive end.But the taste is really good.It will clean you out.
customer_reviews.author: Jamella Horne

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Tastes fine. I mix it with water and drink it all at once. I have noticed a great improvement with my ‘movements’ lol. I would recommend this products. Simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Weigel

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting, good feeling!!
customer_reviews.text: My co-worker turned me on to this drink and I love it! The taste is great and it just makes my body feel good!! I've only tried one other flavor and didnt really like it. This one is my fav!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie

customer_reviews.title: and perfect purples. I have two shakers a day of ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would become a spokes person for the ojc lineup, and the reds, oranges, and perfect purples. I have two shakers a day of all of those products. Love these products, and have been drinking them for years now.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnee M. Overcast

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell, tastes worse.
customer_reviews.text: Rancid smelling, taste almost as bad. Orange Juice is a must to mix it. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well and I mix mine with my veggie smoothies sometime
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Want to feel better? Use this product. Not sure what else to say.
customer_reviews.text: Want to feel better? Use this product. Not sure what else to say. I promise you that I'm not wealthy, not even close. And this stuff ain't cheap. Yet I do whatever I need to do to be able to afford it. Only because it works to keep me healthy and without that I can't make money.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have enough juice or water it gets thick.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Really do love it. Doesn't cramp your stomach like so many ...
customer_reviews.text: Really do love it. Doesn't cramp your stomach like so many other products do. The taste is tolerable. The more I drink it, the better it tastes because I've gotten use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Taste Good. Mixes Easily.
customer_reviews.text: Taste good. Mixes Easily. Scoops are real big, so it's not over powering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Container Not FUll
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the product works. However, the container wasn't as full as all of the other containers I've received. It made me a little leery to drink it because the container wasn't full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Container half empty
customer_reviews.text: Just received this in the mail. And i pulled the seal back and the container is half empty. Wow
customer_reviews.author: kyra

customer_reviews.title: The product makes me more health and alert.
customer_reviews.text: I personnally recomend this product, Tastes good and makes me feel more health and alert.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Its one of the best tasting and mixes real well with any liquid
customer_reviews.author: David Becker

customer_reviews.title: Truly love this product
customer_reviews.text: Truly love this product, gives me energy and I feel confident that it does in fact cleanse my system in all aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff. Taste is good. I feel energized after drinking it. DB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, I am diabetic I take 1 scoop before ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ,I am diabetic I take 1 scoop before workout ,my energy level stays ,No crash.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very gritty and I honestly didn't notice a big difference between it and taking a multivitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It taste great / mixes good and has very good ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Chambers

customer_reviews.title: it takes like grapico! love
customer_reviews.text: If you blend this with blueberries and half a banana with ice... it takes like grapico! love it
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great on mornings that I don't have time to juice and when I am traveling. AND it tastes good too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: OJC Plus works for me
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Been using OJC Plus for 3 months now instead of buying vegetables and it works for me. I take one serving in the morning for breakfast and I feel it giving me energy to start my day. Then I take another serving in the late afternoon. It does everything it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the taste and feel like I am getting my daily dose of vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Hosier

customer_reviews.title: My two adult children love it.
customer_reviews.text: When I'm done with this, I am done. It's okay, but I don't want any more. My two adult children love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Caused uncomfortable feelings during the cleansing process. Taste was very plain/weak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Juicing in a can
customer_reviews.text: Good product for supplementing important nutrients missing from regular diet. Positive results from the additional fiber content. All the benefits of juicing without the mess or fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did taste good, mixed easily but it is to pricey for my budget to continue buying it.

customer_reviews.title: ... using OJC for about two weeks now and really love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using OJC for about two weeks now and really love this product! I mix it with juice and it tastes great. Have to really take the time to mix it thoroughly though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The taste is better than the green apple
customer_reviews.text: The taste is better than the green apple. I did notice though that it expired 6/2015. Need to check that before you ship to customers. Being that it is only September.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jo Cookus

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!! Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!! Buyer beware! It taste awful! I got no energy but a headache every time. Seller does not care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the worst tasting drink I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: evd007

customer_reviews.title: TASTES HORRIBLE DOESN'T WORK!
customer_reviews.text: THIS STUFF TASTES HORRIBLE AND IT DIDN'T DO ANYTHING BUT LEAVE A BAD TASTE IN MY MOUTH.
customer_reviews.author: RUNANDTELLTHAT

customer_reviews.title: My lifestyle is very busy and having a product like this as a supplement in insuring that I get ...
customer_reviews.text: What a solution! I'm a former juicer, My lifestyle is very busy and having a product like this as a supplement in insuring that I get the nutrition from both fruits and vegetables is GREAT. Not quite finished with my first container yet but I have definitely made it a part of my regimen.
customer_reviews.author: lawynza pearson

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, and not too sweet.
customer_reviews.text: The juice itself had a refreshing taste. I think that maybe at a later time, I will give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy A. White

customer_reviews.title: Yucky, gritty, nasty, green powder
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to like this product. When opening the container it smells very sweet but this is a decoy to the taste. I mixed one scoop with 8oz of water and drank it. The first few times I stomached it but didn't enjoy it. But this morning I couldn't do it. I felt nauseous over the disgusting taste. I'm really pissed I spent $40 on this crap and honestly I just want to throw it away. I wish they had a return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur de Peach

customer_reviews.title: I really like these greens
customer_reviews.text: I really like these greens! It is very energizing and a good price. A bit chalky if you don't shake it constantly unless you put in a smoothie then it's no problem. The flavor is good though. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was unflavored
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of an easy way to supplement my daily veggie intake, but I won't be buying this again unless they offer an unflavored kind. The taste of the "natural flavors" added is very strong and very un-natural. Just the smell from it stinks up the whole cupboard I store this in. Even with the added flavoring it still tastes like a tall glass of veggie sawdust, so why bother? If I want it to be berry flavored I can mix the powder into a glass of actual berry juice instead of water.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Over priced for what it is IMO
customer_reviews.text: I am more into freshly made juice/smoothies, but decided to give this a try. This is a terrible tasting product. The after taste is even worst.
customer_reviews.author: Ja-Storm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This taste good I will be ordering this delicious drink again my new green juice😄
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great juice cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Has lots of good stuff in it. I feel like my system is running better when I drink a glass of this in the morning.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and much easier than use fruits and vegetables

customer_reviews.title: Good but very pricey!
customer_reviews.text: I like using a product like this but it is rather expensive!

customer_reviews.title: I have to say so far this is a better tasting green drink that I have try
customer_reviews.text: I have to say so far this is a better tasting green drink that I have try. Green drinks usually r nasty tasting. This one i can actually tolerate.

customer_reviews.title: It cost too much
customer_reviews.text: To be sure I am getting the benefits of a lot of fruits and veggies.

customer_reviews.title: Woof
customer_reviews.text: Sadly - may be the worst thing I've ever tasted.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good. Fills me up, and I notice a difference in my energy level.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product and find I do better using it less than daily.

customer_reviews.title: OJC good to the last drop
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad mix with orange juice what a drink
customer_reviews.author: michael harris

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome! I like the taste
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I like the taste, unlike other reviewers. I put a scoop in the shaker with water and a little ice, shake that up, then let it sit for a few minutes. That seems to dissolve more of the powder chunks. I've noticed slightly more energy, healthier digestion, and love that I'm getting my nutrients daily. Definitely will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MyThoughtsExactly

customer_reviews.title: It's actually pretty tasty. However
customer_reviews.text: I followed the suggested use and mixed this product with water, and added ice. It's actually pretty tasty. However, about 3/4 the way down the glass I was greeted with sludge. That is to say the fiber supplement thickened at the bottom of the glass. Although the taste was still good not very palatable, to me.
customer_reviews.author: Randy A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't taste anything like the sample they send out. It tasted horrible.
customer_reviews.author: SBChicago

customer_reviews.title: Tastes okay, but I'm not sure what the benefits ...
customer_reviews.text: Tastes okay, but I'm not sure what the benefits are.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bad taste, too expensive and quality of the product not the good.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty way for a quick and healthy meal or snack.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product for my morning smoothies. My favorite is to mix in almond milk, baby spinach, and a frozen fruit (especially frozen pears)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little irritating to my throat, but The taste was great

customer_reviews.text: This came half of the container, you think before open it the sise will be perfect, and big surprise when you open this...

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in the taste
customer_reviews.text: I use my nutri-ninja daily and was excited to try this new product. I was very disappointed in the taste. It is very bland. It's terrible that with every possible flavor available, the juice still turns out terrible.

product_meta.title: Certified Organic Juice Cleanse OJC Plus Berry Surprise - Purity Products - 30+ Organic Veggies and Fruits - 5 Grams of Fiber - Promotes Energy and Digestive Function - 12.28 oz - 348 g - 30 Servings
feature_bullets: AS FEATURED ON TV. New and Improved with Over 30 Organic Fruits, Berries, and Veggies. Takes the hassle out of juicing. Only 45 calories, No added sugar, Truly delicious taste.
JUICING MADE SIMPLE. Juicing every day is big commitment. Consider all the shopping, washing, blending and cleaning. OJC is the ultimate juicing shortcut, saving you time and money,

PLANT BASED VEGETARIAN SUPERFOOD POWER PACKED WITH BENEFITS. If you’re looking to support your energy and vitality, liver and digestion, OJC lets you unleash the power of nature to take your health to the next level.
FIBER TO THE RESCUE. Experience the ultimate cleanse and detox support action of OJCs Organic Fiber Matrix, powerfully promoting digestive wellness, regularity, satiety and a healthy gut.
QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST. Certified Organic, Vegetarian, and contains no ingredients derived from GMOs
